headline: FedEx’s Fred Smith, Blackstone’s LePatner, and 4 Other Notables We Lost This Year
summary: Smith, founder and longstanding CEO of  FedEx  was the son of a successful businessman.  Smith, who twice declined Bush’s offer to make him Defense Secretary, played himself in Tom Hanks’ movie Cast Away.
